b   0.756   0.808   0.744   0.042   0.049   0.043   0.065   0.058   0.067   0
I'm not sure if there is something wrong in the glazing input
lines. (I'm a novice in both Unix and Radiance :)

Thank you very much.
Siritip

however you may need to add an end-of-line to the file.
